text: Zid vecer said GOD's hand puto nadol! It bol ich hands puto nadol. They condemned for uttering such blasphemy! Radsej Jeho hands bol siroky je otvorene spending mat rad He wills. Istota tvoj Lord's revelations do ona zapricinit vela z them plunge deeper into transgression disbelief! Consequently my committed them animosity hatred themselves Dni Vzkriesenie. Whenever they ignite flames vojnovy GOD puts them! They roam zem wickedly GOD nemat rad evildoers
